metadata.name: Longing For Connection
metadata.description:
We're hardwired to connect. Human connection gives us a sense of belonging. But solitude helps us get to know ourselves & allows us to re-connect with others in meaningful relationships.

VOL 01: RE-CONNECT inspired by Ingmar Bergman’s masterful, intense close-ups, the use of portraiture & framing in his films & how it can be translated into contemporary digital art.

• 2048 × 1392 MP4
• 25fps
• 30 secs

You will receive a Metareum. Members-only special access to enter METARATA & download unlockable content:

• 3840 × 2612 H.264
• 4 high-res stills from selected frames
